items.text: My daughter (3 years) attended BIBO for 3 months. She adapted quickly thanks to attentive and professional teachers. Small groups, delicious food, walks in own yard, nap if child wants. Children do music, dance, theater. Special thanks to Luiza, Maya and Eka!
items.author: Marina Lobanova

items.text: We've been going to BIBO for less than a month, but my review matured in the first days. Very pleasant, soulful, cozy place for kids. Great menu, lots of space for games, cozy sleeping places on second floor. Closed yard with natural surface. There's a sandbox (so rare in Tbilisi). The staff's attitude to children is amazing: so much attention, care, love. It's something from childhood, something from grandma's house. My son (1 year 9 months) really wants to go there every day.
items.author: Polina Mamedova

items.text: The kindergarten is 35 years old. Wonderful attitude to children. Russian-speaking children attend. I'm delighted with the garden. There's English, dance, music, sports. At the time of writing the review 500 lari/month — the lowest price compared to other gardens. Has own fenced playground for walks. Daytime sleep by choice — good beds on 2nd floor. I recommend BIBO to everyone!!!
items.author: Polina Pavlova

items.text: BIBO Kindergarten is the place where I can leave my child and not worry about anything, knowing they will always be under the wing of caring nannies.
items.author: Denis Stepanenko
